Package alydiaade.flooringmastery.model

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • alydiaade.flooringmastery.model.Order
  • public class Order
extends Object
    This class handles the Order details. Based on what the user inputs the files will be other properties will be adjusted as required.
    Author:
    lydiaadejumo

    • Constructor Detail

      • Order

        public Order​(LocalDate orderCreation,
             LocalDate orderDate,
             String customerName,
             Taxes taxRate,
             Product product,
             BigDecimal area)
        This is the constructor for the Order class.There are specific details required in order to set up the class.
        Parameters:
        orderCreation - - the date the order was placed.
        orderDate - - the date for the order, some time in the future
        customerName - - customer name required for process
        taxRate - - the tax rate that is being selected based on the state
        product - - the product that is being selected
        area - - The area of which the flooring is required for.
